articles.author: Prakash Nanda
articles.title: Putin ‘Saves’ Russian Military Bases, Interests In Syria Despite Abandoning ‘Incompetent Fool’ Assad: OPED - EurAsian Times
articles.description: There seems to be a global consensus among the strategic elites that the overthrow of the Assad regime is a huge jolt to Iran and Russia, whose military support, along with that of Hezbollah of neighboring Lebanon, the Syrian strongman was critically dependen…
